Georgia lawmakers crafted their new election law to address confusion and controversy around the 2020 election. Their reforms were eminently modest, yet critics apparently did not bother to read the bill. 

#WickerReport

https://t.co/Rt4QMXn1f1
Oftentimes, the best policy choices are the obvious ones. During an inflation crisis, the last thing @POTUS should do is raise costs for the American consumer.

President Biden’s own Treasury Secretary admits that the administration was not prepared for soaring inflation. Their failure to recognize the warning signs does not inspire confidence from the American people. 

https://t.co/XnqMmNpFPe
I hope @commercedems take the appropriate steps to vet and improve privacy legislation before advancing it.
I would welcome a hearing on #ADPPA in @SenateCommerce. A full legislative hearing would be an important part of improving our proposal & creating a balanced national standard.

This legislation represents the best opportunity to finalize comprehensive federal data privacy protections in years. I’m glad to see @EnergyCommerce, led by @FrankPallone & @cathymcmorris, is working to move this proposal forward. The American people shouldn't wait any longer. https://t.co/xUrzlXPlMt

.@JimInhofe is right. China’s military is growing quickly. Russia’s invasion of Ukraine has shocked European security. And inflation is skyrocketing. Support for our national defense must keep up. 

https://t.co/YNMA9WaPc0

Politicians, CEOs, and media elites all bandwagoned to condemn so-called “voter suppression” last year, with President Biden leading the way. Every leader who spread these lies about the Georgia law owes an apology to the American people. 
 
#WickerReport 
https://t.co/eR2qbV8nh4

Americans are paying almost $2 more than they were last year for gas. President Biden’s war on domestic energy production is now proving to be one of his biggest blunders. 

https://t.co/R72TgugivL

Russia holding food hostage is just another example of what happens in Ukraine does not stay there. The global economy depends on helping Ukraine achieve a decisive victory.  

https://t.co/qxnRloeXlx

Last year, President Biden called the Georgia law “Jim Crow 2.0.” Two weeks ago, Georgia held its first primaries since the new election law took effect, and far from “suppressing” the vote, there was record turnout. 

#WickerReport  

https://t.co/eR2qbVpYFE

This week is the 24th Annual Tupelo Elvis Festival. The King of Rock n’ Roll is Tupelo’s native son, and the festival pays tribute to his incredible musical legacy. 

#MississippiMonday https://t.co/GFOpQjQzHk
Gas prices are soaring and could soon hit an average of $5 per gallon nationwide. It is insanity! https://t.co/USqgjueU7e

Thousands of migrants are travelling on their way to cross our southern border because of the false hope President Biden has provided. His lax enforcement and failed policies continue to drive record surges in illegal immigration. 

https://t.co/HmKjodfgXt

This time last year, powerful voices across our country told us that Georgia’s election reforms were a brazen attempt to “suppress” the vote. These voices have gone strangely silent now that their dire predictions have proved false. 

#WickerReport 

https://t.co/eR2qbVpYFE
Fewer than 3 in 10 Americans think that Biden is handling inflation well. We are facing a generational economic challenge, and the President has not stepped up to meet it.

“Strengthened by their courage, heartened by their valor, and borne by their memory, let us continue to stand for the ideals for which they lived and died,” -Ronald Reagan, Pointe Du Hoc, 1984. On this anniversary of D-Day, we remember the heroes who fought for freedom in Europe. https://t.co/CjvXIT2rnP

Critical crop protection products assist farmers. Especially during a time of rising food prices, eliminating access to these tools is a wrong decision. I joined @SenHydeSmith, @RogerMarshallMD, and @SenThomTillis highlighting the need for these tools. 

https://t.co/nqgrZmI0qG

Ukraine has now fought back for more than 100 days against an invasion orchestrated by Vladimir Putin. Their continued courage and determination are an inspiration. They deserve the world’s support in driving Russian forces out of their territory.
Congratulations to @PRCC_Baseball on winning the #NJCAABaseball World Series! You’ve made Mississippi proud! https://t.co/c5ATBiqkRM
Inflation continues to soar at levels we have not seen in decades. President Biden’s plan to correct this has no substance and seems to only favor more runaway spending.

Continually improving aviation infrastructure is essential to maintaining the safety, capacity, and capability of airports in our state. These investments in airports across Mississippi will help promote economic development, travel, and tourism jobs. 

https://t.co/QtvFZoxOgX

I am pleased that @POTUS has nominated Bill Renick to serve on the @TVAnews Board of Directors. Bill has a proven record of serving our state. I look forward to the @EPWGOP’s consideration of his nomination.

https://t.co/esoC2lHzfZ

As I wrote with @RussVought in March, we need to focus on rebuilding a superior Navy without delay. It is time to demonstrate a serious commitment to our national defense. 

https://t.co/wzKn6IzcoT

China’s launch of a third aircraft carrier and potential construction of even more is a wake-up call. President Biden cannot continue to sink American seapower. 

https://t.co/08gFUoILR1

Today I joined @FrankPallone and @cathymcmorris to release a draft of a comprehensive national data privacy and data security framework.

This bipartisan and bicameral effort has been years in the making. See our draft here via @SenateCommerce. https://t.co/PS7K3lMStQ

The Marine Force Design 2030 moves the ball forward in creating a more flexible and effective Corps in the service of deterring China. @sethmoulton and @RepGallagher are right. We should move as fast as we can to implement this vision. 

https://t.co/edD1GGaeBi

June is Alzheimer’s & Brain Awareness Month. We must continue to invest in cutting-edge research to end this terrible disease and win the fight. I will keep up the fight in Congress to make sure no stone is left unturned. #EndAlz

The Hyde Amendment and pro-life protections deserve our unwavering support. I joined @SenHydeSmith on a letter to Leader Schumer to deliver that message. 

https://t.co/Dzj87wRwAh
Another day, another record high at the pump. This is the Biden Administration at work. https://t.co/xj6KZqEtFz

Sweden and Finland’s accession into NATO is within the national interest and will make our alliance stronger, I argued in @NRO last month. 

https://t.co/TAeNPqN08B

Sweden and Finland would bring important military capabilities to the NATO alliance. This week’s military exercise in the Baltic Sea stands to prove their worth.  

https://t.co/VOsmO3uhxM

When you dig yourself into a hole, the first thing you do is stop digging. The way out of an inflationary crisis is not for President Biden to keep spending.

Taiwan is an important trade partner, and a vital democratic ally. Stronger economic ties will benefit both the U.S. and Taiwan.

As we remember our fallen heroes this Memorial Day, it is fitting that we should renew our commitment to caring for their loved ones who were left behind. 

#WickerReport  

https://t.co/JuzogB0dPX

China is amassing military power at an alarming pace, posing a threat to our democratic ally Taiwan. Keeping Taiwan safe will require effective deterrence. I am glad to work on a bipartisan effort to provide Taiwan the equipment it needs to deter China.

https://t.co/96UpTonWfE
Strong countries require strong borders. President Biden needs to stop holding back our law enforcement and secure our southern border without delay.

Our naval superiority over China is slipping, and there is no alternative to a strong U.S. fleet for our national security. Congress must make rebuilding our fleet a top priority. 

https://t.co/jATbKxGszl

Beginning with the War of Independence, American service members have risked life and limb on the battlefield to protect our country, reminding us that freedom is never free. 

#WickerReport

https://t.co/Yb9x1tGWle
